CIPHER.0.cipherString: Mind is everything: muscle, pieces of rubber. All that I am, I am because of my mind.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: The Cold War isn't thawing; it is burning with a deadly heat. Communism isn't sleeping; it is, as always, plotting, scheming, working, fighting.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Melody is a form of remembrance.… It must have a quality of inevitability in our ears.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: I won't mention the word tired. This is the 20th century and I can go around a little faster.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Our intention is to really explore this transition and, beyond that, explore the particular things that someone comes up against when they're gay or lesbian.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: No one will ever win the battle of the sexes; there's too much fraternizing with the enemy.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: You can't start worrying about what's going to happen. You get spastic enough worrying about what's happening now.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: I am not struck so much by the diversity of testimony as by the many-sidedness of truth.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: Americans need to understand the significance of having their civil liberties dismantled. It doesn't just affect terrorists and foreigners, it affects us all.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: On every thorn, delightful wisdom grows, In every rill a sweet instruction flows.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: Whatever poet, orator or sage may say of it, old age is still old age.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: You can never guess or assume what anyone is going to think.
